SOUTH SAN FRANCISCO

properties.sfomuseum:description: Correspondence from P. J. Shaw of South San Francisco Land and Improvement Company, to P. R. Thompson of South San Francisco Chamber Of Commerce, dated January 10, 1927, confirming permission for use of area for temporary field, for price of $900 rent through December 31, 1927; includes agreement to extend option on 221.4 acres of land east of Bayshore highway at price of $1784.10 per acre, or total consideration of $395,000; single typed page.
